description: The N.C.A.A. said that it would delay a $2,000 stipend for athletes until it can be reconsidered at January’s convention, after 125 colleges requested the delay.
title: N.C.A.A. Athlete Stipend Delayed
title_page: N.C.A.A. Athlete Stipend Delayed - The New York Times
maintext:
The N.C.A.A. said that it would delay a $2,000 stipend for athletes until it can be reconsidered at January’s convention, after 125 colleges requested the delay. Legislation was passed in October to give some athletes an additional $2,000 beyond tuition, room and board, books and fees.
¶ Mike Gundy of Oklahoma State was honored as the national coach of the year by the Football Writers Association of America.
